job.title: Developer I - Software Engineering
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: <strong><u>Requirements<br><br></u></strong><strong>Job Description<br></strong><ul><li> Candidates must have at least 2-4 years of hands on experience with Python and Tcl programming.</li><li> Needs to have advanced Unix/Linux programming skills.</li><li> Excellent interpersonal and analytical skills with the ability to work independently</li><li> Highly motivated, excellent team spirit, product and customer oriented</li><li> Ideal candidate would have at least 1 year of hands on experience supporting Python SW development for CAD Tools or other HW applications for latest design, methodology, technology, algorithms and automation.<br></li></ul><strong><u>Education<br><br></u></strong>Required - Bachelors of Science degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or similar field.<br><br>Preferred – Masters of Science degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or similar field.<br><br>Position will work from home until policy is lifted. Employee is expected to be onsite after July. This is a top priority position.<br><ul><li> Ideal candidate would have at least 2 years of hands on experience supporting Python SW development for CAD Tools or other HW applications for latest design, methodology, technology, algorithms and automation.</li></ul>
